summary: Add an admin-only UI control to reset application data via an unauthenticated backend resetAll() function.
architectural_notes: Scope constraint: only modify the admin page to add a “Reset All Data” button wired to backend resetAll(); no unrelated page/file changes.
Backend resetAll() must be callable without requiring caller or principal (no auth/identity requirement).

existing_features.title: Add a "Reset All Data" button to the existing admin page (`frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsPage.tsx`) that triggers the backend `resetAll()` call, with a destructive confirmation dialog and clear success/error feedback.
Add a React Query mutation hook to call backend `resetAll()` and integrate it into the admin page without changing unrelated pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a “Reset All Data” button on the admin page that calls a backend resetAll() function without requiring caller/principal; do not change unrelated pages.
Implement a backend `resetAll()` function that resets all application data and does not require any caller/principal authorization.

projectName: Add Admin "Reset All Data" button wired to unauthenticated backend resetAll()
